description:
While shopping at a Christmas market, Cocoa and the other girls plan a Christmas party. Then on Christmas Day, Maya, Megu, and Aoyama-san join the gang, and their lively Christmas party begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shoujo wa Akai Gaitou o Matoi Usagi o Karite Seiya no Sora o Iku
The Girl Dons a Red Coat and Drives a Team of Rabbits Across the Christmas Eve Night Sky
Vêtue d’un manteau rouge, elle chevauche un lapin dans le ciel de la sainte nuit
少女は赤い外套を纏いウサギを駆りて聖夜の空を行く
